meanings.definition: A thing that someone says to cause amusement or laughter, especially a story with a funny punchline.
meanings.sent1: She told hilarious jokes at the party.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys listening to jokes during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The jokes at the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her jokes were like little bursts of joy.
meanings.sent5: The jokes he shared were like colorful balloons popping with laughter.

meanings.definition: To make jokes; talk humorously or flippantly.
meanings.sent1: He jokes with his friends to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent2: She often jokes around to make people smile.
meanings.sent3: The comedian jokes about everyday situations.
meanings.sent4: His words joked playfully with the seriousness of the topic.
meanings.sent5: They joked their way through the difficult conversation.
